tool.name: GAIAC data synchronization
tool.description: Returns files with time synchronized data
tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
This tool synchronizes the data based on time from the different files.
-----
**Inputs** Time sychronization tool * **--Input files** tabular data files (example input1.tsv, input2.tsv.... inputn.tsv ).
-----
**Outputs** * Returns time synchronized files.
